divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard, at 2pm, when I noticed a white orb hovering, around three o'clock high in the north of the sky. This was high above the airplanes coming in to LAX and was like a star moving very very, slowly east until it disappeared behind a cloud and was gone once the cloud moved.
Summary: White orb in Northern sky, moving very slow , then disappeared in clouds
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Whittier

This sighting has never been favorited.
